title: RBI Issues New Foreign Exchange Management (Guarantees) Regulations, 2026
content:
# RBI Issues New Foreign Exchange Management (Guarantees) Regulations, 2026

Ek important update hai. Reserve Bank of India (RBI) ne cross-border guarantees ke liye naye regulations announce kiye hain, jo ki Authorized Dealer (AD) banks ke liye naya framework set karte hain.

*   **Notification Details:** RBI ne Foreign Exchange Management (Guarantees) Regulations, 2026, Notification No. FEMA 8(R)/2026-RB dated January 06, 2026, ko publish kiya hai.
*   **Effective Date:** Ye naye regulations January 12, 2026 se effective ho gaye hain.
*   **Purpose:** Ye regulations AD banks ko detailed guidance provide karte hain, specially un guarantees ke liye jahan koi ek party India ke bahar rehti hai.
*   **Supersession:** In naye rules ne pehle ke Foreign Exchange Management (Guarantees) Regulations, 2000 (FEMA 8/2000-RB) ko supersede kar diya hai.
*   **Mandatory Reporting:** Ab sabhi guarantees—chahe wo issue kiye gaye hon, modify kiye gaye hon, ya invoke kiye gaye hon—unki comprehensive reporting AD banks ko prescribed Form GRN mein karna mandatory ho gaya hai.
*   **Reporting Format:** Is return ko submit karne ka exact tareeka aur format RBI jald hi communicate karega.
*   **Key Change in Reporting:** Trade Credit guarantees ke liye quarterly reporting requirement March 2026 se discontinue kar di gayi hai. Late Submission Fees (LSF) ka mechanism bhi introduce kiya gaya hai.
